Articles.Content: What if a new mode was added, that mode being WAR MODE!!! In the war mode, you would get guns and things available to you (such as cannons, machine guns etc) and new parts that hold ammo. Other weapons could also be flamethrower that uses liquid fuel, and attacking lasers that use electricity. Up in several orbits (as in around kerbin, mun, duna, etc.) would be 'pirate' ships that attack you and try to destroy your ship, and also on the actual planets would be 'evil' kerbals that attack you and your ship if you land. HOW AWESOME WOULD THIS BE!!?
Weaponry and war-related features are on the Official What not to suggest list - this is a stickied thread, so you should have read this first before posting.

There will be (and already are, I believe) mods for this type of thing. But officially, there won't be any kind of war mode. As mentioned, it's on the do not suggest list and it's kind of beyond of the scope of KSP anyways.

Also, having AI pirate ships that attack your ship would be impossible to do well. I mean, they can't know anything about your ship other than tonnage and crew capacity. Maybe they could be made to aim for the pods, but it would still be an incredibly robotic experience.

if you want to shoot things up, there's a million games for that. Try Eve Online for example. Of course you're the one getting shot up there for the first several years until maybe you've gained the skills and equipment to compete with the experienced players.

KSP is not a shooter, and it will never be.

Go play TF2 or something.

Alirght, I believe everyone already picked that one up. This is indeed on the what not to suggest list and has even been confirmed to not be in the final release of the game. Please make sure to check other stickies like the already suggested list and the official forum rules before posting.

That being said, I guess all there needs to be done now is to close the thread.
